plays.text: Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Boarding Serge Aubin

Penalty to Blake Sloan 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Manny Legace

Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Igor Larionov
